levels.levelDescription: I have a basic knowledge of the framework. I understand the framework principles and I can implement solutions defined at the documentation or tutorials
I modify effectively already working solutions to include new features
I can analyse working solutions and I can propose refactors and generalisations
I can define complex architectures and I can provide optimised solutions
I can add new literals and I know how to use it at code
I can use variables at phrases
I can use plurals and I can make it working with all defined languages
I can use advance features at multilingual project
I understand the framework principles and I can implement solutions defined at the documentation or tutorials
I modify effectively already working solutions to include new features
I can analyse working solutions and I can propose refactors and generalisations
I can define complex architectures and I can provide optimised solutions
I have a basic knowledge of the framework. Understand the framework principles and can implement solutions defined at the documentation or tutorials
I can modify effectively already working solutions to include new features
I can analyse working solutions and propose refactors and generalization
I can define complex architectures and I can provide optimised solutions
I can write components using react-native syntaxis
I can write conditional code depending on platforms
I can write mobile responsive components
I can manage different native components according OS specific guidelines, like ActionSheets, selectors
I can work effectively modifying existing solutions implemented with it
I can develop new solutions that use it. I can add the dependency to a new project and create reusable components with this library
I have some CSS knowledge to create simple animations integrated with the library mixed with react components
I know how to create transitions between pages. I have advanced CSS knowledge to create simple animations integrated with the library mixed with react components
I have a basic knowledge of the library. I understand when use redux state and when use the component state.
I can separate concepts and I have a proper usage of actions and reducers

I am able to keep a normalised state, using complex reducers in order to guarantee immutability and flatten/efficient
 structures
I can use the library in combination of others to build complex solutions.
I can add new sagas into a working project
I can configure from the scratch a new project
I can write both sync and async sagas processes

I can use Sagas to manage the state of all the components such ui (modals/toast) navigation (navigate between screens) 
 and app state
